backend/main.mo: Actor manages user submissions and profiles with permission checks and admin-only retrieval of all responses and summary data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base variables defining OKLCH color palette, theme tokens, and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app controlling lock, question, and reveal flows plus optional admin mode, rendering corresponding screens.
frontend/src/components/MusicToggle.tsx: Component providing play/pause control for background music with graceful fallback on audio errors.
frontend/src/components/rose-day/RoseDay: Admin view listing all submissions with loading, error, and empty states, using UI components and scroll area.
Full-screen lock screen with animated heart and a button that triggers onUnlock.
Three-step question wizard that collects answers and submits them via a backend hook.
Reveal page showing romantic text and a dialog triggered by a button, with animated hearts.
frontend/src/components/rose-day/RosePet: Generates animated floating rose-petal emojis positioned randomly on screen.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identity, and auth client behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoseDaySubmissions: Hook fetching all Rose Day submissions from the backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitRoseDayAnswe: Hook for submitting Rose Day answers with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base plus custom rose-themed colors, animations, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL and hash params, storing and retrieving values in sessionStorage, and persisting parameters across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, color palette, fonts, and plugins with extended OKLCH-based color definitions.
project_state.json: Describes the projectâ€™s current state and feature list for a Rose Day interactive website, including requirements for unlock flow, reveal page, and admin view.
